about.title: About
about.description1: The MEDOL Group of Companies was created by highly qualified specialists in the field of medicine, engineering and economics, who have significant experience in the market of high medical technologies, which has its own offices in different parts of the Earth. In 2011, MEDOL registered in Uzbekistan FE LLC 'Medical Online Services
about.description2: The company’s goal is to build a transparent long-term business, to benefit society through the development and implementation of advanced technologies in the healthcare system of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
